titleStmt.title: Saint Petersburg, The National Library of Russia (Российская национaльная библиотeка), Marcel 51

respStmt.resp: Edited by Michael Marx in collaboration with Tobias J. Jocham et. al. TEI version created by Yasmin Faghihi and Huw Jones

msIdentifier.repository: The National Library of Russia (Российская национaльная библиотeка) , Saint Petersburg

summary.p: 8 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 51; Qurʾānic Text: Q 11:12-11:21, Q 23:75-23:77; 8 lines per page; Dimensions: 257 x 180mm; Script style: kūfī D.III.
The fragments Marcel 52, Marcel 102/2 (NLR) and probably Marcel 48, Arabe 357 (BNF), Ms. orient. A 435 and A 461 (Gotha) belong to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
8 fol. 180×257 mm (1.55). Support: thin rigid transparent parchment of yellowish color, with traces of polishing. Writing material: ink, from light to dark brown.
Collation: one fragmentary quire and a sheet from another (the other half of bifolium or the stub is cut off along the fold).
I: H1F H2F H3F S H4F / F5H F6H S F7H S (fol. 2 and 7, 4 and 5 are bifolia, the rest are singletons with stubs);

Text layout: 83/85×155/160 мм (1.8?), 5 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D III. Diacritics: green diagonal dashes; omitted alifs of the long ā added also in green. Vocalization: red, green and blue round dots.

Verse markers: for individual verses – trefoil (type 2.2.3b) with red dots between golden petals, green dot in the center; for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses – medallion (type 2.A.II) in gold and colors with the inscribed number of verse (عشرون – fol. 7v).
Stitching: thread is preserved in the punctures of the fold.
Defects: minor stains; margins damaged, probably by rodents; parchment damaged by aggressive ink on fol. 8; ink peeling off on the flesh side.
Old accession numbers: B. 29 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Fol. 1r–7v. Surah 11, verses 15(12)–23(21). Incipit:[عليه كنز] او جاء معه ملك . Explicit: ما كانوا يفتر[ون لا جَرْمَ] .
Fol. 8r–8v. Surah 23, verses 77(75)–79(77). Incipit: [في] طغيانهم. Explicit: اذا هم فيه [مبلسون*] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 52 (NLR), Marcel 102 (fol. 2 and 4) (NLR), probably Marcel 48(NLR), Marcel 49(NLR) and Arabe 357 (BNF); Gotha 435; Gotha 461."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
